about_the_game:
Fourteens is a game where you select pairs of cards that equal 14. The two cards in a pair must be in the same row or column. When you select a pair, the two cards of the selected pair will be removed. Clicking the refresh button will fill in the empty spots with new cards from the deck. If there's no more cards in the deck, it'll reorder the remaining cards in a top-down left-right fashion. The objective of the game is to remove all of the cards of the entire deck in the shortest amount of time.

When you buy and install this DLC, the mini-game will appear on the main menu as an option in the games list.
Click or touch the game in the games list to start a new level.

Touchscreen Support

Woohoo! - Game "Fourteens" supports touchscreens. You can also use a stylus pen or your finger to select cards.
(Touchscreen-enabled laptop or tablet required.)
